00112   private function _retriveURLArguments()
00113   {
00114     // Default will be false
00115     if ($_GET['formOnlyReportFailes'] == '1')
00116     {
00117       $this->_bOnlyReportFailes = true;
00118     }
00119     else
00120     {
00121       $this->_bOnlyReportFailes = false;
00122     }
00123 
00124     // Default will be true
00125     if ($_GET['formEchoDetails'] == '1' || !array_key_exists('formEchoDetails', $_GET))
00126     {
00127       $this->_bReportFailDetails = true;
00128     }
00129     else
00130     {
00131       $this->_bReportFailDetails = false;
00132     }
00133 
00134     // Default will be false
00135     if ($_GET['formRunAllTests'] == '1')
00136     {
00137       $this->_bRunAllTests = true;
00138     }
00139     else
00140     {
00141       $this->_bRunAllTests = false;
00142     }
00143 
00144     // Default will be 0
00145     $this->_currentTestCase = $_GET['formTestCase'];
00146 
00147     if (empty($this->_currentTestCase))
00148     {
00149       $this->_currentTestCase = 0;
00150     }
00151   }

00157   {

00167   private function _runAllTests()
00168   {
00169     foreach($this->_testCaseFilesArr as $key => $row)
00170     {
00171       $this->_runTest($key);
00172     }

00182   private function _runTest($testCaseNumber_)
00183   {
00184     if ($testCaseNumber_ > 0)
00185     {
00186       include_once($this->_testCaseFilesArr[$testCaseNumber_]['path']);
00187       $obj = &new $this->_testCaseFilesArr[$testCaseNumber_]['class_name'];
00188       $obj->doTest();
00189 
00190       $this->_writeGuiResult($obj->getTestResult());
00191       unset($obj);
00192     }
00193   }
00194 
00199   private function _doRetriveAllTestCases()
00200   {
00201     $files = array();
00202     $this->_fillWithFilesFromDir($files, $this->_testCaseRoot);
00203 
00204     if (!empty($files))
00205     {
00206       asort($files);
00207 
00208       $testCase = count($this->_testCaseFilesArr);
00209       foreach($files as $file)
00210       {
00211         $testCase++;
00212         $pathParts = pathinfo($file);
00213 
00214         $this->_testCaseFilesArr[$testCase] = array
00215         (
00216           'package' => $pathParts['dirname'],
00217           'path' => $file,
00218           'class_name' => $pathParts['filename']
00219         );
00220         $this->_numOfTestCases++;
00221       }
00222     }
00223   }
00224 
00228   private function _fillWithFilesFromDir(&$files_InOut, $path_, $addFiles_ = FALSE)
00229   {
00230     if (is_dir($path_))
00231     {
00232       $result = dir($path_);
00233 
00234       while($entry = $result->read())
00235       {
00236         if (is_file($path_.$entry) && $addFiles_)
00237         {
00238           if (strtolower(substr($entry,-4)) == '.php')
00239           {
00240             $files_InOut[] = $path_.$entry;
00241           }
00242         }
00243         elseif(is_dir($path_.'/'.$entry) && $entry != '.' && $entry != '..')
00244         {
00245           $this->_fillWithFilesFromDir($files_InOut, $path_ . $entry . '/', TRUE);
00246         }
00247       }
00248     }
00249   }
